author: Han Solo
content: Go to the pier, take a speedboat to the submarine platform, take a submarine to dive into the 7-meter deep Red Sea, and enjoy the mysterious and beautiful underwater world of the Red Sea. There is also a diver's show for you to feed fish from the bottom of the sea. Transfer included, accompanied by a guide

author: Han Solo
content: Depart from the hotel to the pier around 5 in the morning and take a boat to the west bank of the Nile. Hot coffee, tea, and small snacks are prepared on board the boat. Ride a hot air balloon to meet the sunrise and overlook Luxor. Experience a different kind of Luxor from above by visiting attractions such as Hubble City, the Queen's Temple, and the Valley of the Kings. After landing, a small celebration ceremony will be held and guests will be presented with certificates. Then return to the hotel by car.

author: Han Solo
content: The itinerary is for reference only and depends on the specific weather conditions of the day. If you are unable to ride a hot air balloon due to weather conditions, the original price will be refunded!

author: Han Solo
content: Take a specially customized cruise ship with a large viewing window at the bottom of the cruise ship, which is convenient for enjoying the wonderful underwater world. Transfer included, accompanied by a guide Note: Please be safe when disembarking and disembarking. Do not be crowded or slippery in line. 70 USD/person (from 4 people)
